title: Time Slip
story: In the quiet town of Willow Creek, strange things have been happening recently.
Residents have reported experiencing time travel anomalies, with some claiming to have witnessed events from the past or future.
Local authorities are baffled by these occurrences and seek the help of renowned scientist Dr. Emily Bennett, whose controversial theories on time manipulation may shed light on the situation.

suspect.name: John Anderson
suspect.alibi: John claims to have spent the entire day in his workshop, working on his latest invention. He has no knowledge of any time travel anomalies.
suspect.confirmation: Willow Creek Library has CCTV footage confirming John's alibi. He was recorded entering the library at the time of the reported anomaly.

witness.name: Sarah Foster
witness.observation: Sarah witnessed the time travel anomaly firsthand while taking a walk in the park.
witness.description: According to Sarah, an elderly couple suddenly appeared in front of her, wearing clothing from the 1920s. They seemed just as surprised to see Sarah as she was to see them.

npcs.name: Officer Davis
npcs.dialogue: I've been patrolling this town for years, and I've never seen anything like this. Time travel? It's impossible!

npcs.name: Dr. Emily Bennett
npcs.dialogue: My research suggests that these anomalies may be caused by disruptions in the space-time continuum. We need access to the park at the time of the incidents to gather more evidence.

clues.Park: Footprints matching the description of the elderly couple's shoes from the 1920s.
clues.Library: CCTV footage showing John Anderson entering and leaving the library at the time the incident occurred.
clues.Sarah's House: A large vintage clock that was not present prior to the anomaly.
clues.Elderly Couple's Residence: A diary belonging to the elderly couple containing detailed accounts of their time travel experiences.
